tool_description: + 245 Hockey Leagues & Cups with Livescore, Odds, Bookmakers, Statistics, Standings, Historical Data, Countries, Seasons. Documentation : https://api-sports.io/documentation/hockey/v1. Widgets : https://www.api-football.com/widgets
name: API-HOCKEY
title: API-HOCKEY

api_list.name: Timezone
api_list.description:
Get the list of available timezone to be used in the games endpoint.

> This endpoint does not require any parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Seasons
api_list.description:
All seasons are only 4-digit keys, so for a league whose season is 2018-2019 the season in the API will be 2018.

All seasons can be used in other endpoints as filters.

> This endpoint does not require any parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com/seasons/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com/seasons/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-hockey.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description:
Get the list of available countries.

The name and code fields can be used in other endpoints as filters.

> All the parameters of this endpoint can be used together.

api_list.name: Search Countries
api_list.description: search countries

api_list.name: Leagues
api_list.description:
Get the list of available leagues and cups.

The league id are unique in the API and leagues keep it across all seasons

> Most of the parameters of this endpoint can be used together.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the league : league or cup

api_list.name: Search Leagues
api_list.description: Search Leagues

api_list.name: Teams Statistics
api_list.description: Get Teams statistics for a league and a season

api_list.name: Standings
api_list.description:
Get the standings for a league.

Return a table of one or more rankings according to the league / cup. Some competitions have several rankings in a year, regular season, pre season etc…

To know the list of available stages or grou^ you have to use the endpoint standings/stages or standings/groups

> Standings are updated every hours

api_list.name: Stages
api_list.description: Get the list of available stages for a league to be used in the standings endpoint.

api_list.name: Groups
api_list.description: Get the list of available groups for a league to be used in the standings endpoint.

api_list.name: Games
api_list.description:
For all requests to games you can add the query parameter timezone to your request in order to retrieve the list of games in the time zone of your choice like “Europe/London“

To know the list of available time zones you have to use the endpoint timezone

> Games are updated every 15 seconds

> This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

api_list.name: Heads 2 Heads
api_list.description: Get heads to heads between two teams.

required_parameters.name: h2h
required_parameters.description: The ids of the teams : id-id

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: Get all events from one game

api_list.name: Bets
api_list.description:
Get all available bets.

All bets id can be used in endpoint odds as filters

api_list.name: Search Bets
api_list.description: Search Bets

api_list.name: Bookmakers
api_list.description:
Get all available bookmakers.

All bookmakers id can be used in endpoint odds as filters.

api_list.name: Search Bookmakers
api_list.description: Search Bookmakers

api_list.name: Teams Details
api_list.description:
Get data about teams.

The team id are unique in the API and teams keep it among all the leagues/cups in which they participate.

> This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

api_list.name: Search Teams
api_list.description: Search Teams

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description:
Get odds from games or leagues.

We provide pre-match odds between 1 and 7 days before the game.

We keep a 7-day history (The availability of odds may vary according to the leagues, seasons, games and bookmakers)

> Odds are updated once a day
